alert.note: Alert for Box Butte; Dawes; North Sioux; South Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 12:33PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Box Butte, southwestern Dawes and southern Sioux Counties through 1215 PM MDT... At 1133 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles northwest of Flahertys Corner to 6 miles southeast of Agate Bed National Monument. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Box Butte Campground, Agate Bed National Monument, Flahertys Corner and Marsland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Box Butte; Dawes; North Sioux; South Sioux
